reasoning.step2:
GrandTotal.Amount (538.80)
- Evidence: "Endbetrag 538,80 EUR" and "zahlbar ... 538,80 EUR".
- Consistency check: Net 449,00 + Vat 89,80 = 538,80.
- Confidence: 98%

Invoice.Date ("21.11.2023")
- Evidence: Date appears as "Datum ... 21.11.2023" and "Lieferdatum 21.11.2023".
- Confidence: 99%

Sender.VatId ("ATU 63022268")
- Evidence: Bottom block shows "UID-NR: ATU 63022268" under Weidenthaler GmbH (sender).
- Ambiguity: Top section also lists "ATU 64131246" labeled "Ihre USt-ID-Nr." (customer). That is a different VAT and appears tied to customer, not sender.
- Confidence: 92%

Vat.Rate (20.00)
- Evidence: Line "zuzüglich USt 20,00% aus 449,00".
- Extraction rule applied: percent returned as number without symbol.
- Confidence: 99%

Net.Amount (449.00)
- Evidence: "Gesamtbetrag 449,00 EUR" and base amount used to calculate VAT ("aus 449,00").
- Confidence: 99%

Vat.Amount (89.80)
- Evidence: "zuzüglich USt 20,00% ... 89,80 EUR"; matches 20% of 449,00.
- Confidence: 99%
